title: The Best Robot Vacuum and Mop Combos, Chosen by Experts | Digital Trends
text:
iRobot Modern technology offers a lot of ways to help out around the house, and one of the most popular is a robot vacuum. These nifty devices are even being designed nowadays with mop functionality built-in, and we’ve taken the liberty of rounding up the best robot vacuum and mop combos on the market. There’s a lot to consider when shopping for one of the best robot vacuum and mop combos, and we’ve got all the direction you’ll need there as well. So whether you’re looking to land some robot vacuum deals or just want to ensure you’re getting the best model for your needs, read onward for more details.
The best robot vacuum and mop combos Best robot vacuum and mop combo overall — Best budget robot vacuum and mop combo — Best robot vacuum and mop combo for smaller homes — Best robot vacuum and mop combo for smart features — Best robot vacuum and mop combo for pet owners — Best robot vacuum and mop combo for fully automated cleanings — Best robot vacuum and mop combo for mopping — How to choose a robot vacuum and mop combo There’s a lot to consider when it comes to choosing the right robot vacuum and mop combo for your needs. With so many option on the market, some great ways to narrow down your selection is by considering what you want out of the device. Do you want it to clean while you’re out of the house? How large is your home? Do you have pets, children, or other reason for high foot traffic?
Consider your home Your home is probably going to be the most important factor when ensuring you get the right robot vacuum and mop combo. The size of your house is an obvious consideration, but you’ll also want to take a good look around about the surface of your floors. Most robot vacuums will be able to clean up any kind of surface, but some will be better at hard surfaces than carpets, and some will be better at cleaning up carpets than hardwood and tile.
Related The best outdoor security cameras of 2023 The best Amazon Alexa smart speakers The best robot lawn mowers for all types of lawns The amount of foot traffic your floors see is also something to think about, as pet owners and people with kids may want to consider a robot vacuum and mop combo with stronger suction and better build quality.
Smart features While there are a lot of smart home devices to consider, robot vacuums are among the most popular due to their smarts. Many robot vacuums will have the capability to scan your home and create a virtual map for itself, which allows them to avoid things like furniture, pets, and stairs. Some robot vacuums will even go a step further, and with these models the virtual map can be used to set cleaning zones and cleaning schedules, allowing you to get more precise with the robot’s automation.
Cleaning capabilities You wouldn’t want to get a traditional vacuum that doesn’t do a good job of cleaning up, and this is the case with a robot vacuum as well. While many robot vacuum and mop combos will focus on smart features as their main selling point, you’ll want to be sure they can get the job done when it actually comes to cleaning.
How we chose these robot vacuum and mop combos Robot vacuums have been around for some time now, and we’ve had our eye on the best robot vacuum and mop combos for all of it. We’ve put several models to our own personal use, but we have also spent years writing about and recommending dozens of different models. We’ve filtered our selections for the best robot vacuum and mop combos through this expertise, with extra consideration placed on newer releases and affordability.
Roborock S8 Pro Ultra Best robot vacuum and mop combo overall Roborock Pros Cons Impressive vacuuming skills Short mopping height Mops and vacuums in single run Auto-emptying capability Easy-to-use app The RoboRock S8 Pro Ultra comes in at a premium price point but it offers premium capabilities. It can vacuum and mop in a single run, and it can also clean itself while docked. If the robot senses its mop is dirty, it will head back to the charging station to get cleaned up. It’ll also dry itself after each run, ensuring you don’t get any nasty odors from mold or mildew. The Roborock S8 Pro Ultra isn’t cheap, but plenty of benefits that outweigh its price point and make it the best robot vacuum and mop combo.
Specifications Suction Drive 6000Pa Mobile App Yes Range Up to 3,250 sq. ft.
iLife V5s Pro Best budget robot vacuum and mop combo iLife Pros Cons Low-profile design No auto-empty dock Long battery life Manually switch cleaning tanks Super affordable When it comes to landing a robot vacuum and mop combo at one of the best prices available you’ll want to check out the iLife V5s Pro. This is a great budget option, and it leans heavily on minimalism to get there. It has a super slim design that will come in handy if you have any low-rise furniture. With a lower price point does come some missing features, however, and this robot vacuum and mop combo doesn’t come with auto-emptying functionality. It’s little to give up for a budget option, though, so dive into the iLife V5s Pro if you’re looking to save a few bucks.
Specifications Cleaning Modes Auto, Spot, Max, Edge Automatic Charging Yes Endurance Up to 120 minutes
Shark AI VacMop Robot Best robot vacuum and mop combo for smaller homes Shark Pros Cons Works with smart assistants Poor battery life Auto switches mop and vacuum Manually switch cleaning tanks Multiple preset modes If you’re an apartment dweller or own a smaller home you’ve still got to keep the floors clean, and the Shark AI VacMop Robot is a good option for doing so. It’s an all-in-one device that doesn’t have too many features, but the ones it has are just right. It has multiple preset modes you can use to switch from vacuuming, sonic mopping, and a deep clean mode. These modes are assisted by an AI laser navigation that ensures the robot doesn’t bounce into walls or fall down stairs. This robot vacuum and mop combo does have a shorter battery life than you’ll find among others, but with less surface area to clean it shouldn’t be much of an issue.
Specifications Surfaces Wood, Carpet Mobile App Yes
Narwal Freo Auto Mopping and Washing Robot with AI Dirt Sense Best robot vacuum and mop combo for smart features Narwal Pros Cons Self-detecting and self-cleaning Uses proprietary cleaning solution Unique mop pad design Great for all floor types LCD display station Owners of the Narwal Freo Auto Mopping and Washing Robot really love it, as it has a ton of great features and technology in it. This is a super smart robot that can take care of itself by way of its Dirt Sense system. This helps it intelligently detect how dirty the mops are when returning to its station, where it can then be sanitized before its next use. It has a unique design, yet it’s also capable of delivering exceptional cleaning support. It can also detect just how dirty your home is while cleaning and decide whether or not to make multiple passes to ensure it doesn’t call it quits until the job is done.
Specifications Surface Recommendations All Mobile App Yes Capacity 480mL
Ecovacs Deebot T20 Omni Best robot vacuum and mop combo for pet owners Ecovacs Pros Cons Sleek design Not ideal for thick carpets Powerful mopping pads Powerful suction The Ecovacs Deebot T20 Omni is ideal for pet owners, as it has powerful suction and a tangle-free rubber brush that combine to take on pet hair. It has a ton of smarts as well, with TrueMapping 2.0 and TrueDetect 3D 3.0 technologies to both map your home for ideal cleaning patterns and to keep the robot from bumping into furniture and other obstacles. It also comes with an all-in-one station for emptying itself when the job is done.
Specifications Surface Recommendations Hardwood, Carpet, Tile Self-Cleaning Yes Suction Drive 6000Pa
Roomba Combo j7+ Vacuum and Mop Best robot vacuum and mop combo for fully automated cleanings iRobot Pros Cons Fully automated cleanings A little pricey Sleek design Powerful suction The Roomba j7+ has a ton of smart features, including the ability to learn your home for automated cleanings. It’s even capable of cleaning up in-the-moment messes like crumbs under the kitchen table with a simple voice command. It will build personal smart maps of your house, enabling it to expertly clean and navigate in neat, efficient rows, and to know where to go when you give it a command to clean a certain area. The Roomba j7+ is also capable of recognizing patterns in your cleaning behaviors, and can recommend certain times of the day for vacuuming, or vacuuming certain rooms at certain times. It’s a little pricey compared to some of our other selections, but if you’re interested in a fully automated cleaning option, the Roomba j7+ is the way to go.
Specifications Surface Recommendations Carpet, Hard surfaces Mobile App Yes Cleaning System 4-stage
Bissell SpinWave Robot Best robot vacuum and mop combo for mopping Bissell Pros Cons Simple interface No frills Vacuums and mops Inefficient travel routes Low profile Easy to empty dustbin The Bissell SpinWave Robot is the best robot vacuum and mop combo if you have a lot of hard-surfaced floors. It’s a completely capable vacuum, but it really comes out ahead as a mop. It’s capable of mopping hardwood, tile, linoleum, and other sealed hard floors. It does so with a powerful mop and a two-tank cleaning system. It also has the smarts to know to stay away from carpets while it’s mopping. You can also set it for automated cleaning cycles so you it can do the work of keeping your floors clean while you’re out of the house.
Specifications Suction Drive 1500Pa Endurance Up to 100 minutes Mobile App Yes
